name: 陳擎文
objective:
本課程將盡量從實務的角度來講解電子商務。

內容將採用理論與實作並行的方式。

課程理論部分將介紹電子商務的定義與發展歷史，涵蓋 B2B、B2C、C2C、O2O 等主要類型，並探討台灣電商業者發展平台的常見路徑。學生將學習經營電子商務的七種主要方式，包括自建平台、第三方平台銷售、微商、社交電商等，同時了解 SEO-SEM、社群行銷、Email 行銷和內容行銷等關鍵的網路行銷策略。後半部分課程還將結合案例探討供應鏈管理、社交媒體平台與網紅 / KOL 合作的經營模式、及跨境電商的趨勢。

課程實作部分將帶領學生開發電子商務網站，從前端技術（Html+CSS）到後端技術（PHP+MySQL）進行實際操作。此外，學生將學習如何使用 JavaScript 追蹤客戶行為，應用 SEO 技巧和響應性網頁設計（RWD）來提升網站在搜尋引擎的排名，並通過 Google Analytics 進行流量分析，以理論結合實作，提升學生的實務操作能力。

This course will approach e-commerce from a practical perspective.

The content will combine both theory and practical exercises.

The theoretical part of the course will introduce the definition and development history of e-commerce, covering major types such as B2B, B2C, and C2C, and exploring common pathways for developing e-commerce platforms by Taiwanese companies. Students will learn seven major ways to operate e-commerce, including self-built platforms, third-party platform sales, micronet, social e-commerce, and more. They will also gain an understanding of essential online marketing strategies such as SEO-SEM, social media marketing, email marketing, and content marketing. The latter part of the course will include case studies to explore supply chain management, business models involving social media platforms and influencer/KOL collaborations, and trends in cross-border e-commerce.

The practical part of the course will guide students in developing an e-commerce website, with hands-on practice in front-end technologies (Html+CSS) and back-end technologies (PHP+MySQL). Additionally, students will learn how to use JavaScript for customer behavior tracking, apply SEO techniques and responsive web design (RWD) to improve search engine rankings, and utilize Google Analytics for traffic analysis. This combination of theory and practice aims to enhance students' practical skills in e-commerce.
schedule:
第 1 週：課程介紹
Week 1: Course Introduction

第 2 週：電子商務的定義與發展歷史，電子商務的類型（B2B, B2C, C2C, etc.），台灣電商業者發展電商平台的常用路徑
Week 2: Definition and Development History of E-commerce, Types of E-commerce (B2B, B2C, C2C, etc.), Common Pathways for Developing E-commerce Platforms by Taiwanese E-commerce Companies

第 3 週：經營電子商務的 7 種方式：【自建電商平台，第三方平台銷售，微商，社交電商，訂閱制電商，代發貨模式，聯盟行銷】等
Week 3: Seven Ways to Operate E-commerce: [Self-built E-commerce Platform, Third-party Platform Sales, Micronet, Social E-commerce, Subscription-based E-commerce, Dropshipping, Affiliate Marketing], etc.

第 4 週：網路行銷常見的 4 種策略：【SEO-SEM 促進流量，社群行銷，Email 行銷，內容行銷建立品牌形象】
Week 4: Four Common Internet Marketing Strategies: [SEO-SEM for Traffic Promotion, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Content Marketing for Brand Building]

第 5 週：實作：電子商務網站開發的架構（包括前端平台與後端平台與數據庫），開發前端商務網站前端平台（Html+CSS）
Week 5: Practical Exercise: Developing the Front-end of an E-commerce Website (Html+CSS)

第 6 週：實作：追蹤客戶行為的代碼基礎：JavaScript
Week 6: Practical Exercise: Basic Coding for Customer Tracking: JavaScript

第 7 週：實作：網路行銷 SEO 的第 1 個重要技巧方法，提升在搜尋引擎的排行
Week 7: Practical Exercise: The First Key Technique in SEO for Internet Marketing: Improving Search Engine Rankings

第 8 週：實作：網路行銷 SEO 的第 2 個重要技巧方法：響應性網頁 RWD
Week 8: Practical Exercise: The Second Key Technique in SEO for Internet Marketing: Responsive Web Design (RWD)

第 9 週：期中作
Week 9: Midterm Exam

第 10 週：【供應鏈管理】是【快時尚電商】競爭力的關鍵 --> 以 Zara，SHEIN 為例
Week 10: Supply Chain Management as the Key Competitiveness in Fast Fashion E-commerce: A Case Study of Zara and SHEIN

第 11 週：【跨境電商】是當前電商的趨勢 --> 以 SHEIN，Temu，Amazon 為例
Week 11: Cross-border E-commerce as a Current Trend: A Case Study of SHEIN, Temu, and Amazon

第 12 週：電商的大數據分析：【即時分析交易數據，客戶瀏覽行為分析，精準推薦，分析市場需求，風險管理】--> 以 Netflix ，SHEIN， Amazon 為例
Week 12: Big Data Analysis in E-commerce: [Real-time Transaction Data Analysis, Customer Browsing Behavior Analysis, Precision Recommendation, Market Demand Analysis, Risk Management]: A Case Study of Netflix, SHEIN, and Amazon

第 13 週：【社交商務與網紅經濟】：使用 UGC 進行營銷是新的趨勢 --> 以小紅書，SHEIN 為例
Week 13: Social Commerce and the Influencer Economy: Marketing with UGC as a New Trend: A Case Study of Xiaohongshu and SHEIN

第 14 週：實作：架設網站與實務：Apache + PHP + MySQL，後端平台的建構技術：PHP (1)
Week 14: Practical Exercise: Website Setup and Practice: Apache + PHP + MySQL, Back-end Development Technologies: PHP (1)

第 14 週：活動促銷廣告影片與腳本設計（使用 AI 工具)
實作二套最強大的 AI 生成影片工具：Vidu、Sora
實作使用 AI 工具來撰寫腳本
實作：使用 AI 工具製作促銷影片與廣告視頻

第 15 週：行銷活動廣告影片的音樂（使用 AI 工具 (2)
實作 AI 配樂工具：使用 Sudo 根據影片腳本來自動生成影片配樂
實作 AI 影片剪輯工具：使用 ClipChamp 來自動配音與配字幕，並剪輯影片

第 16 週：行銷活動廣告影片的 AI 影片剪輯（使用 AI 工具 (3)
實作 AI 配樂工具：使用剪映剪輯影片
實作 AI 影片剪輯工具：使用 ClipChamp 來自動配音與配字幕，並剪輯影片

第 17 週：實作：用 Google Analytics 進行客戶流量追蹤與流量分析
Week 17: Practical Exercise: Using Google Analytics for Traffic Tracking and Analysis

第 18 週：期末作
Week 18: Final Exam
